name: streaming-selector
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

scripts.dev: npm run install-all && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
